detail_desc: Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while running. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and ventilating mesh at the crotch for increased ventilation. Legs with reflective details for increased visibility outdoors and a slit in one side of the hems. Soft jersey inner shorts.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front, shimmering sequins on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fancy dress costume in stretch, printed jersey with long sleeves, a seam at the waist and an asymmetric tulle skirt in several layers. Lined skirt.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in a soft organic cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cold shoulder blouse in a viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication and a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a smocked hem.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in a linen and cotton weave with buttons at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a gathered seam and a flared skirt with patch front pockets. Cotton lining.

Shirt in soft, brushed cotton twill with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Two flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Top in a softly draping weave with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. 23 pairs of studs and two pairs of hoops. size from 0.2 cm to 1.8 cm.
Straight-cut coat in a stretch weave with notch lapels, a button at the front and side pockets with a decorative flap and button. Unlined.
Shorts in cotton piqué with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in stretch jersey with draping at the top and a gathered seams at the sides for best fit over the tummy. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, padded, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets, inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, and folded seams. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Calf-length dress woven in an airy viscose blend with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back and chest pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, 3/4-length, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, an elasticated waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Pencil with a pompom. Length of pencil 15 cm, total length 18.5 cm.
Set in a soft fine knit consisting of gloves, a hat and a scarf. Length of scarf 26x180 cm.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sandals in woven fabric with foot and ankle straps that have a hook and loop fastening. Moulded soles.
Lined bandeau bikini top with a concealed silicone trim at the top, side support and lightly padded cups with removable inserts.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline, deep armholes with raw edges, and slits in the sides.
Court shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes and covered block heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a motif.

Fleece-lined jacket in a nylon weave with a small print motif at the top, stand-up collar and detachable, jersey-lined hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Longer and rounded at the back.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and long puff sleeves.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, decorative metal rings, narrow sides and a high cut at the back.
Briefs in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Calf-length trousers in a viscose weave with covered elastication, a small frill trim and decorative bow with tassels at the waist. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Top in a patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Jumper in a soft textured knit containing some wool with a polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey, one in pointelle. Press-studs down the front and along one leg, a small satin bow at the front, short sleeves and short legs. Picot trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton blend with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short shorts in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and rounded hems.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, darts at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved dress in a soft knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in airy chiffon with a square neckline front and back, smocked bodice and 3/4-length puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and smocked cuffs with a frill trim.

Oval waist bag in grained imitation patent leather with a zip at the top and an adjustable waist strap in woven fabric with a plastic fastener. Recycled polyester lining. Depth 4.5 cm. Height 12.5 cm. Width 18.7 cm.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck opening at the top with a short frilled collar with ties at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a flounce and ties at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.
Tube scarf in a rib knit. Width 30 cm, circumference 125 cm.
Shirt dress in an airy viscose weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with a tab and button. Seam under the bust and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a V-neck racer back.
Short, fitted off-the-shoulder dress in jersey with short raglan sleeves.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with round toes, a zip in the side and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 3 cm.
Short dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Thin metal chain necklace with pendants.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Belt with two rows of metal eyelets and a metal buckle. Width 4 cm.
Leggings in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Bandeau bikini top with a knot detail at the front, lined, lightly padded cups and side support. Detachable, adjustable straps that fasten at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal hook fastening at the back.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Short-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave with embroidery and a V-neck with a small frilled collar that ties at the front. Frills down the front that continue over the shoulders to the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut, long-sleeved dress in woven fabric with a concealed zip at the back and shoulder pads. Sparkly stone fringes at the back and down the sleeves.
Dress in a glossy weave with a V-neck at the back, buttons down the back, a sewn-on bow at the waist and a glittery, flared skirt in layered tulle. Lined.
Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with a crinkled texture. Round neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and gathered seams at the hips and knees for added volume.

Padded mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with reflective details. Palms in anti-slip fabric for an extra-good grip, and a plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Elastication and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the wrists and soft inner ribbing at the top. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a motif and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short jumper in a soft knit with low dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a high collar, padded hood and a zip and wind flap with concealed fasteners down the front. Discreet handwarmer pockets with a concealed press-stud and flap front pockets with a concealed fastener. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.
Top in linen jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline.
Imitation leather wallet with six card slots, a zip at the top and a decorative tassel. Size 2x8x10.5 cm.
Short lace skirt with a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Jacket in soft washed denim with a collar, press-studs down the front, fake flap pockets with a button at the top, and press-studs at the cuffs.
Oversized top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Shirt in washed linen with a grandad collar, French front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder (no press-studs in sizes 1-4Y).
Hat in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the hem.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket woven in a viscose blend with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Ribbed cuffs and a seam at the hem with flounce.
Short, fitted skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, detachable belt and a concealed zip and slit at the back. Unlined.
Semi-opaque control-top tights that shape the tummy and seat. 15 denier.
Knee-length skirt in an airy patterned weave with fringing. Concealed zip and a slit at the back. Lined.
